message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to start with an offer of $180. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $140. I can meet you halfway between $180 and $140, so I'm willing to offer it to you for $160. Is that something you'd consider?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $155? I really think this product would be a great fit for me.
